title: Picture perfect letters
content:
After seeing what [Dan Tobin Smith](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203339/http:/www.dantobinsmith.com/) was able to do with random, everyday objects (aka junk), Iâ€™ll definitely be thinking twice before throwing anything away.
